benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/tags - Add tags to payment

covered: POST Valid Payload scenarios: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC11, TC12, TC14, TC19, TC20
Invalid Payload and Input Validation: TC06, TC07, TC08, TC09, TC10, TC16, TC17
gaps: Caching behavior / ETag and Cache-Control headers are not tested for POST responses
Rate limiting / throttling tests are not present
500 Internal Server Error scenarios (distinct from 503) are not covered
Content-type/invalid media type edge cases and other header validation specifics not explicitly tested
GET/Pagination-specific concerns are not applicable here, but pagination for any related listing endpoints (if any) are not tested
recommendations: Add tests to validate 500 Internal Server Error scenarios (simulate DB/service failures) in addition to the existing 503 case
Introduce tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) on POST responses if the API supports caching semantics
Add rate limiting / throttling tests to verify behavior under bursty or high-load conditions beyond the current concurrency test
Include edge-case payload-type tests (e.g., incorrect Content-Type, missing/invalid Accept headers) to strengthen payload validation
If there are related GET/list endpoints for created tags, add pagination tests and verify consistent results across large datasets
Consider explicit security-focused tests (e.g., input sanitization beyond basic invalid payloads, CSRF-like checks if relevant)
